getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; input: string; label: string }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the clipboard. Useful for composition.

onCopyStatusChange.description: The function to be called when the value is copied to the clipboard

timeout.description: The timeout for the copy operation

value.description: The value to be copied to the clipboard
